name: k.d. lang
description:
We've had some bizarre ancestries on our website. Ben Kingsley's Indian/British/Kenyan/Jewish/Mulsim combination is hard to top.

But Canadian pop/country singer/songwriter k.d. lang sure comes close.

Yes, she's part Jewish. But she's also... brace for this... part

English
Scottish
Irish
German
Russian
Icelandic (!)
Sioux (!!!)

Man, that must be one family reunion. Move over, Sir Kingsley, we might just have a new winner.

And now that that's settled... What's the deal with all the lower casing?
